attributes.title: Garbage. Absolute Trash. -98/10
attributes.review: This app is so nefarious in every sense. It jumped out of my phone and manifested a rat to appear in my room. I am now homeless and it’s stolen my wife and three kids 💔. I cannot find a job because this app burned down my office and my mother doesn’t love me anymore. Fix this before it breaks another household. 🙏🏾

attributes.title: USELESS App!!
attributes.review: This app is so useless it seems to give me alerts about a clown instead of an actual president. I also regret downloading this app on my phone because it’s so poorly made and overal is just a waste of space. If you want to get alerts on the president you might as well use tik tok. Yukk what a disgusting app..

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: I tried to have an opened mind but this app made my phone go really slow and I don’t even have that many app downloaded honestly if I could delete this app from the App Store I would no one deserves getting the phone getting destroyed by this app

attributes.title: Yasmina Elsibai
attributes.review: This app is trash. It glitches every time I want to do something. It doesn’t let me buy anything from the store. My keyboard types random stuff all by itself. I honestly don’t like this app and it should be removed from the AppStore. Plz help us by giving it a one star rating thank u.

attributes.title: the WORST app I have EVER downloaded
attributes.review: did not satisfy my need to educate. glitched. the app sent a text to my mom telling her to replace the water in her body with jello. apparently the people who made this app are not very educated and it shows in the poor layout and downright terrible graphics. 10/10 would NOT recommend.

this app is truly terrible while i was downloading my phone blew into pieces and when i went home the app had taken my tv and bed and it gets worse when i went into the grindr my burrito was gone and so i took my pet fish for a walk and he died rip 🕊 never forgotten and also it didn’t even download right it’s showing me the stupid things are “president” is doing but past time i checked obama is my president ☺️,,  anyways don’t download this app unless you want someone to eat your burrito and steal your tv :) have a good day 🥰

attributes.title: Terrible.
attributes.review: For one I just don’t like Trump. It glitches it’s slow and more. Since he is America’s president I would have expected something better but then again I’m used to be let down by trump. This app is just a waist of space and u shouldn’t download. And one more thing: yes I came from tik tok.

attributes.title: Mentally and emotionally traumatizing
attributes.review: Downloaded this app only to find nothing but fake news (it was saying this guy is worthy of any type of support even though he is clearly a rac1$t, h0m0ph0b1c, orange fasc1st)!!?? Looking at its contents caused nausea, headaches, optical migraines, kickstarted my anemia, dangerously escalated my heart rate, and unstoppable tear-flow. Overall total physical and emotional exhaustion.

attributes.title: Glitches on my BRAND NEW PHONE.
attributes.review: I Downloaded this app to get updates on trumps campaign and now my phone has TONS of glitches. I’m talking my texts have all disappeared, my contacts have all been wiped out and some of my photos are gone! This is the worst app I’ve ever seen. Not worth the storage space 🤢

attributes.title: A clown 🤡
attributes.review: A rasict, homophobic, transphobic beech who is making 2020 even worse the it already is! Go worry about dying children and then worry about tiktok😡. vote barron trump 2020! You are even worse the adolf hitl3r! sweetie pie I will not enjoy spending all eternity in hell with you. Plz go figure out your life before becoming president and and die in a hole you clown
